name: 廖昭文
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation      Week 2:  Big Changes- reading            Week 3: Big Changes- grammar and listening  Week 4: Careers - reading
Week 5: Careers- grammar and listening    Week 6: What Will Be Will Be- reading     Week 7: What Will Be Will Be- grammar and listening
Week 8: Review and exercise    Week 9: Midterm exam and Proficiency Test  Week 10: Advertising- reading     Week 11: Advertising - reading and discussion    Week 12: Advertising- grammar and listening
Week 13: Did You Hurt Yourself- reading  Week 14: Did You Hurt Yourself- reading and discussion     Week 15: Did You Hurt Yourself- grammar and listening    Week 16: Take My Advice- reading   Week 17: Take My Advice- Grammar and Listening    Week 18: Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
Midterm Exam - 35%
Final Exam - 35%
Attendance, homework, quizzes - 30%
materials: Textbook: Mega Goal 4, by Manuel Dos Santos, McGraw Hill
